# This is a comment, anything starting with a '#' is ignored
# Board 1
#
# Tiles:
#	0 : Regular	( destroyed with 1 hit, blue )
#	1 : Explosibe	( destroyed with 1 hit, destroys nearby tiles, orange )
#	2 : Hard	( destroyed with 5 hits, white -> black )
#	3 : Unbreakable ( destroyed with lots and lots of hits, yellow )
